beans.description:
This adaptor does the following...
* reads data from stdin * publishes data to a JMS queue
It is designed to illustrate the basic structure of an adaptor that processes data by publishing to JMS queues
Run it like this...
java org.openadaptor.spring.SpringAdaptor -config publisher.xml -bean Adaptor
You need the following in your classpath
lib lib/openadaptor.jar lib/openadaptor-spring.jar lib/openadaptor-depends.jar jbossall-client.jar (this is not distributed with openadaptor)
This example relies on a default instance of jboss running (http://www.jboss.org) on the same machine that the example is being run.
Once it is running you need to type some data into the command line. To verify that this is working you need to be running the corresponding subscriber example.
